onset.Description: Start time of the event, in seconds.

duration.Description: Duration of the event (required in BIDS but not a part of the EEG.event structure; therefore consists of 0 values

sample.Description: Sample point of the event in data points, relative to the start of the EEG recording.

value.Description: The code used to indicate an event marker.

Levels.11: Flanker type compatible, target direction left
Levels.12: Flanker type compatible, target direction right
Levels.21: Flanker type incompatible, target direction left
Levels.22: Flanker type incompatible, target direction right
Levels.111: Response hand left, flanker type compatible, target direction left
Levels.112: Response hand left, flanker type compatible, target direction right
Levels.121: Response hand left, flanker type incompatible, target direction left
Levels.122: Response hand left, flanker type incompatible, target direction right
Levels.211: Response hand right, flanker type compatible, target direction left
Levels.212: Response hand right, flanker type compatible, target direction right
Levels.221: Response hand right, flanker type incompatible, target direction left
Levels.222: Response hand right, flanker type incompatible, target direction right
